BackstoryDef.title: Colonial pioneer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a grand colonization plan and came to rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun] received a long period of survival training and physical exercise during the voyage. Compared to most people who live on this planet, [PAWN_pronoun] is fully prepared.

BackstoryDef.title: Survival expert
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a grand colonization plan and came to rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun] is one of the most experienced colonists in the colonization team and has participated in numerous successful and failed colonization projects throughout his life.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial guard
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a grand colonization plan and came to rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun]'s job is to establish an advance outpost well in advance of the arrival of the main force and send signals back to show the fleet that the planet is still worth the long voyage.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial medic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in a grand colonization plan and came to rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun]'s duty is to conduct medical or chemical extermination of alien diseases and biological hazards at advance outposts long before large forces arrive.

BackstoryDef.title: Ecologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. Responsible for completing the ecological and species research on this planet before the arrival of the large army, so that future colonization work will be smoother.

BackstoryDef.title: Geologist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. Responsible for cooperating with the orbiting detectors to complete the collection and labeling of geological data on the planet before the arrival of the colonization group.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial architect
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is from a professional pioneering group. Responsible for the planning and construction of permanent and temporary residences at landing sites. Of course, also have to learn to save [PAWN_pronoun] own life from attacks by local natives.

BackstoryDef.title: Local diplomat
BackstoryDef.description: As we all know, most of the planets in rimworld are in a state of disorganized social organization, but the job of [PAWN_nameDef] is to establish good relations with these local indigenous people as much as possible on behalf of the colonial fleet, to facilitate future colonization work can go more smoothly.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial farmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is responsible for caring for the plants in the community, and testing soil pH and moisture. Track growth and choose crops suitable for local conditions.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial mechanic
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for hand forging tools and parts in a colony site where stamping printers were not allocated, and also developed knowledge of cutting and assembly machinery.

BackstoryDef.title: Colonial miner
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has been working with mines almost all [PAWN_pronoun] life, digging with machinery and explosives. Of course, sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] also has to dig with [PAWN_pronoun] own hands.
